main.greeting: My name is Tor Kingdon and I tell stories with code.
main.blurb: I've been working in the entertainment business since I was a kid (specifically sound for TV & film) and have decided to use my computer skills to write code instead of making funny noises.

profileImage.altText: Tor in front of Carnegie Hall

projects.description: Bicycle-friendly bicycle directions. It was programmed with Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also used the frameworks/libraries Flask, WTForms, Jinja2, Bootstrap, jQuery and plugins from Mapbox & Select2. It uses APIs from Mapbox, Mapquest, and Open Weather Service
